thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's Mahindra & Mahindra Dec-Qtr Profit Up About 12 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Mahindra & Mahindra Dec-Qtr Profit Up About 12 Pct
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - Mahindra And Mahindra Ltd:
* DEC QUARTER PAT 12.16 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 10.81 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* MAHINDRA AND MAHINDRA LTD CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR DEC QUARTER PROFIT WAS 9.89 BILLION RUPEES
* DEC QUARTER REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 115.78 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 118.44 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* SAYS DEC-QUARTER EXCEPTIONAL ITEM 3.86 BILLION RUPEES * SAYS DEC-QUARTER EXCEPTIONAL ITEM PROFIT ON SALE OF CERTAIN LONG-TERM INVESTMENTS IN UNITS, JVS OR ASSOCIATES Source text: bit.ly/2EaPFy6 Further company coverage:
